00032 namespace cupp {
00033 namespace kernel_impl {
00034 
00044 template< typename F_ >
00045 class kernel_launcher_impl : public kernel_launcher_base {
00046         public:
00047                 
00052                 typedef typename boost::remove_pointer<F_>::type F;
00053 
00059                 enum { arity = boost::function_traits<F>::arity };
00060                 
00061                 
00070                 kernel_launcher_impl (F func, const dim3 &grid_dim, const dim3 &block_dim, const size_t shared_mem=0, const int tokens = 0) :
00071                 func_(func), grid_dim_(grid_dim), block_dim_(block_dim), shared_mem_(shared_mem), tokens_(tokens), stack_in_use_(0) {};
00072 
00073 
00077                 virtual void configure_call();
00078 
00079                 
00087                 virtual boost::any setup_argument(const device &d, const boost::any &arg, const int pos ) {
00088                         return real_setup_argument< arity >::set (d, arg, pos, *this);
00089                 }
00090 
00091 
00095                 virtual void launch();
00096 
00097 
00102                 static std::vector<bool> dirty_parameters() {
00103                         return test_dirty< boost::function_traits<F>::arity >::template dirty< F >();
00104                 }
00105 
00106 
00107         private:
00112                 template <typename T>
00113                 boost::any setup_argument (const device &d, const boost::any &arg);
00114 
00119                 template <typename T>
00120                 void put_argument_on_stack(const T &a);
00121 
00122         private:
00126                 F* func_;
00127 
00131                 dim3 grid_dim_;
00132 
00136                 dim3 block_dim_;
00137 
00141                 size_t shared_mem_;
00142 
00146                 int tokens_;
00147                 
00151                 size_t stack_in_use_;
00152 
00153                 template <int i>
00154                 friend class real_setup_argument;
00155 };
00156 
00157 
00158 template< typename F_ >
00159 void kernel_launcher_impl<F_>::configure_call() {
00160         if (cudaConfigureCall(grid_dim_, block_dim_, shared_mem_, tokens_) != cudaSuccess) {
00161                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00162         }
00163 }
00164 
00165 
00166 template< typename F_ >
00167 void kernel_launcher_impl<F_>::launch() {
00168         if (cudaLaunch((const char*)func_) != cudaSuccess) {
00169                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00170         }
00171         
00172         stack_in_use_ = 0;
00173 }
00174 
00175 
00176 template< typename F_ >
00177 template <typename T>
00178 boost::any kernel_launcher_impl<F_>::setup_argument (const device &d, const boost::any &arg) {
00179         using namespace boost;
00180         
00181         // get the host type matching our device_type
00182         typedef typename kernel_host_type<T>::type host_type;
00183         typedef typename kernel_device_type<host_type>::type device_type;
00184 
00185         //get what is inside our any
00186         host_type* temp = 0;
00187 
00188         try {
00189                 temp = const_cast <host_type*> (any_cast< const host_type* > (arg));
00190         } catch (boost::bad_any_cast &e) {
00191                 // ok, something is wrong with the types
00192                 // let's throw our own exception here
00193                 throw exception::kernel_parameter_type_mismatch();
00194         }
00195 
00196         if (is_reference <T>()) {
00197                 // ok this means our kernel wants a reference
00198                 
00199                 shared_device_pointer<device_type> device_copy_ptr ( kernel_call_traits<host_type, device_type>::get_device_based_device_copy(d, *temp) );
00200 
00201                 // push address of device_copy in global memory of type device_type* on kernel_stack
00202                 put_argument_on_stack(device_copy_ptr.get());
00203                 
00204                 // return address of of type add_pointer<device_type>
00205                 return boost::any(device_copy_ptr);
00206         } else {
00208                 const device_type &device_copy = kernel_call_traits<host_type, device_type>::get_host_based_device_copy(d, *temp);
00209                 
00210                 // push device_type auf kernel stack
00211                 put_argument_on_stack(device_copy);
00212 
00213                 // return an empty any, this should trigger when some will try to cast it
00214                 return boost::any();
00215         }
00216 }
00217 
00218 
00219 template< typename F_ >
00220 template <typename T>
00221 void kernel_launcher_impl<F_>::put_argument_on_stack(const T &a) {
00222         if (stack_in_use_+sizeof(T) > 256) {
00223                 throw exception::stack_overflow();
00224         }
00225         if (cudaSetupArgument(&a, sizeof(T), stack_in_use_) != cudaSuccess) {
00226                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00227         }
00228         stack_in_use_ += sizeof(T);
00229 }
00230
